permissions.title: Grant permissions
permissions.description: We need permissions to write comments on your behalf & apply to selected issues, directly on OnlyDust.

moreInfos.title: How to grant permissions
moreInfos.description: Click on grant permissions, you will be redirected to GitHub, where you will be asked to log in and grant the permissions. Once you have granted the permissions, you will be redirected back to OnlyDust.
